dyn_cfg Struct Reference

Detailed Description

Dynamic configuration structure.


Data Fields

u_char dyn_msgtyp
 DHCP message type.
u_long dyn_yiaddr
 Offered IP address.
u_long dyn_netmask
 Local IP netmask.
u_long dyn_broadcast
 Local IP broadcast address.
u_long dyn_gateway
 Default gate IP address.
u_long dyn_pdns
 Primary DNS IP address.
u_long dyn_sdns
 Secondary DNS IP address.
u_long dyn_sid
 Server identifier.
u_long dyn_renewalTime
 Renewal time in seconds.
u_long dyn_rebindTime
 Rebind time in seconds.
u_long dyn_leaseTime
 Offered lease time in seconds.
u_char * dyn_hostname
 Local hostname.
u_char * dyn_domain
 Name of local domain.
